title: DRCSim 3.1.1 update via apt no longer loads robot models

content.raw:
I think maybe the /usr/share/drcsim/setup.sh file wasn't properly changed.  When running 'roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas.launch', it can't find the models in atlas_description

content.html:
I think maybe the /usr/share/drcsim/setup.sh file wasn't properly changed. When running 'roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas.launch', it can't find the models in atlas_description
